reviewText: So many books on the Vatican.  Love it!
Allowed my mother to see the Vatican.
Gave me an insight of the hidden world of the Vatican, something I had wanted to see and not just the outside of the Vatican.  I probably don't need to go the Vatican and spend a lot of money.
Beautiful cinematography, interesting window into people's lives in the Vatican.  Especially interesting are the segments on the Pope's bodyguard and an altar boy.
This particular DVD is a little bit bias to the Catholic Church but has behind the scene views that are spectacular.
